p: Other EOs, for example Lippia origanoides, Thymus vulgaris, Lippia alba, Cymbopogon martini, Cymbopogon flexuosus, Rosmarinus officinalis, Salvia officinalis, Swinglea glutinosa, Tagetes lucida, Satureja viminea, Cananga odorata, Citrus sinensis, and Elettaria cardamomum, were investigated for their antimicrobial, antibiofilm, and anti-Quorum sensing (QS) activities against Escherichia coli and Staphylococcus epidermidis [ 27, 28, 29, 30].
